game.name: Z Dawn
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Z Dawn is a survival RPG that takes place in a post-apocalyptic world in which you get to manage a group of survivors to fight for their life, level up their skills, help fight off different breeds of zombies, build and upgrade camp, face hundreds of thrilling events and much more!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Z Dawn is a survival RPG that takes place in a post-apocalyptic world in which you get to manage a group of survivors to fight for their life, level up their skills, help fight off different breeds of zombies, build and upgrade camp, face hundreds of thrilling events and much more!

reviewHighlights.text: 정착지 건설하고 자원 파밍하고 동료 모으는 재미가 쏠쏠한데 인터페이스가 불편하고 파밍 효율이 별로인 게 아쉽다.
